title: Adc champ
body: I need some help picking an adc champ to buy. I currently have 6300ip but I don't know which adc to buy that will help me carry team fights and split push. The champs that I have in mind right now is {{champion:119}}  {{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} these guys seem pretty good to me. If you guys have any suggestions please tell me thnx.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tVa1681c,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-14T23:18:30.183+0000)
>
> Quinn.... Just Quinn

I heard quin is really good since not many people play her so people don't really know how to counter hey which makes her laning really good.

Quinn MAINS ARE THE BOMB!!!! 
Quinn is nice mechanics are pretty easy, Give her a try  {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}}
Also because of the fact she is a built as a lane bully

> [{quoted}](name=GrainZerker,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tVa1681c,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-15T05:48:01.421+0000)
>
> I heard quin is really good since not many people play her so people don't really know how to counter hey which makes her laning really good.

you don't see many because the top adcs now have something that beats quinn. For example Caitlyn with her range, Corki able to bait quinn with using e to bring her away from the support, and most supports are able to make the lane harder for her and people don't want to go though all the annoying and pain in laning to just get to 1 shotting the adc late game so they go for people who are good all game round. WHAT A LONG REPLY

I don't know about Draven but I do main Lucian and Jinx. If you want to split push well, Jinx is great at it once she gets a high level on her q. Her minigun's bonus attack speed is insane and well easily help you push lanes hard. Lucian doesn't really have anything like that especially because you build attack damage. His abilities do allow him to clear waves with the right placement but you also don't want to waste all your mana either. Jinx is also great in team fights, dealing high damage in either AoE or onto a single target and can easily clean up afterwards once her passive kicks in. I'm not even level 30 yet so my opinion might not be correct but its my 2 cents on the question.
EVERYONE BUYS JINX she's a lame adc just stand there no skill needed dude play quinn way better or even draven :,(
Alright I bought jinx the end!
Alright so right now I am picking either {{champion:222}}  or {{champion:119}}

> [{quoted}](name=FuriousFlameDude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tVa1681c,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-03-15T08:17:15.677+0000)
>
> Did I mention {{champion:119}}

NOT ENOUGH i think you need more ;D

Splitpush - {{champion:222}} {{champion:18}} are the fastest turret killers. Jinx is nice because of per passive she can stay that extra second to get the last hit on a turret and run away.

Any ADC can carry a teamfight. Thats what they are designed to do. DPS.

Out of all the ADC's, a good {{champion:119}}  is honestly the scariest since he simply out damages everything and everyone. **But** if you're an average Draven then you are better off picking something less "punishing" when you misplay.

My personal preferences: {{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:42}} 

Honestly almost every ADC is strong, its just what style of play you like more.
Corki and Sivir are other top tier options.
